headline: Assurant Included in Forbes’ America’s Best Employers for Veterans 2024
summary: ATLANTA, November 11, 2024--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, has been included in America’s Best Employers for Veterans 2024 ranking. This prestigious award is presented in collaboration with Statista, the world-leading statistics portal and industry ranking provider. The awards list was announced on November 7, 2024, and can currently be viewed on the Forbes website.
